alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 1:05PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chambers, eastern Liberty and eastern Harris Counties through 200 PM CST... At 105 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Liberty, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Liberty, Dayton, Mont Belvieu, Old River-Winfree, Ames, Daisetta, Hardin, Kenefick, Cove, Dayton Lakes and Moss Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty
